Gangon sits out in the field, considering suicide...

Sent: Saturday, June 17, 2000 9:04 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
>
>
> BrightBlade, Rage
>
> * BrightBlade had nodded towards Hell Beast With the most respect one
could
> show towards another bot and then had gone off towards the ship as she was
> told to do, she had no real clue as to why Hell Beast was spending so much
> time with Liono, wasn't he the enemy? She shook her head but then arrived
at
> the base as she was supposed to do and began to patrol it as she was told.
> Her mind spinning in a thousand different directions, mainly trying to
think
> of why her commander had allied with the enemy.*
>
> ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
>
> * Rage had wondered about in her normal way for a few days, looking for
food
> and actually getting a few tasty morsels that tasted sweeter then anything
> due to her hunger.
> But on the fourth day of being on her own her primitive mind actually
> flashed towards a section of the past that reminded her about the bots who
> lived in the huge metal structures, wondering what they were doing in her
> own primitive way.
> She had had a bit of a relaxing time on her own again but she wanted to
> investigate the new bots she had met and soon began off towards the base
in
> which she had been led to by a bot named Scourge.
> The ship was just as it had been before and she wrinkled her snout, it
> smelled just like before too...like steel.
> She sniffed around a bit but wasn't sure what to make of all of it, she
had
> had a bot take her here and it was strange to be there by herself.
> Rage looked around a bit and kept investigating the area, if any bot
noticed
> her then she was unaware of and was then easy to surprise.*
>
